title: Two-dimensional architecture of N,S-codoped nanocarbon composites embedding few-layer MoS2 for efficient lithium storage
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23004-23010
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04251D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jintao Ren, Dandan Yang, Lei Chen, Zhong-Yong Yuan
Two-dimensional hybrid nanosheets with intimately coupled carbon substrate and few-layer MoS2 are prepared through a universal pyrolysis method, exhibiting a high capacity of 781 mA h g−1 at a current density of 0.1 A g−1 for lithium ion batteries.
